# Draft:The Death of Queen Sirikit, The Queen Mother of Thailand

Queen Sirikit passed away on Friday, 24 October 2025, at 21:21 Thailand time, at Chulalongkorn Hospital, Bangkok, at the age of 93.
Her Majesty’s health condition
On 8 September 2019, the Royal Household Bureau announced that Her Majesty Queen Sirikit, The Queen Mother, had been admitted to Chulalongkorn Hospital, Thai Red Cross Society, at the request of the medical team for follow-up and additional examinations since 7 September 2019.
Since that announcement, there had been no further reports regarding Her Majesty’s health condition until Her passing.
Passed away
The Royal Household Bureau announced the passing of Her Majesty Queen Sirikit, The Queen Mother, on 24 October 2025 as follows:
As previously reported, the team of physicians attending Her Majesty Queen Sirikit, The Queen Mother, had respectfully requested Her Majesty to proceed to Chulalongkorn Hospital, Thai Red Cross Society, on 7 September 2019 for monitoring of various bodily systems. During her stay at the hospital, Her Majesty experienced several episodes of illness, and the physicians detected abnormalities in multiple systems, requiring continuous medical care.
From 17 October 2025, Her Majesty became seriously ill due to a bloodstream infection. Despite the physicians’ utmost efforts to provide treatment, her condition gradually worsened. On Friday, 24 October 2025, at 21:21 Thailand time, Her Majesty Queen Sirikit, The Queen Mother, passed away peacefully (peacefully) at Chulalongkorn Hospital, Thai Red Cross Society, at the age of 93.
His Majesty the King graciously commanded the Royal Household Bureau to arrange the royal funeral and bestow the highest honors according to royal tradition, with the body enshrined at Dusit Maha Prasat Throne Hall, Grand Palace.
His Majesty further graciously commanded that members of the royal family and court officials observe a mourning period for one year, starting from the day of Her Majesty’s passing.
— Royal Household Bureau, 24 October 2025
